name: SkullJumpr
description:
Warning in advance: This is my first ever publicly released game! It breaks after 1-2, mainly because that is literally the last level I made. I've resumed development though, already some updates on their way!

Actual description:

You are a lil' bean guy (name pending). run from a strange cursed flaming skull or get toasted alive and blow up!

This release is quite rushed and short... I just wanted to finally publish my first game after it was on hiatus for too long, so I released it as is.

Starting a devlog (?), check out the playlist on youtube! :)
